post: SELECT * FROM question_group WHERE name = ? AND description = ? AND erased = FALSE
get: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM question_group WHERE erased = FALSE
getId: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM question_group WHERE idquestion_group = ? AND erased = FALSE
put: UPDATE question_group SET ? WHERE idquestion_group = ? AND erased = FALSE
delete: UPDATE question_group SET ERASED = TRUE WHERE idquestion_group = ? AND erased = FALSE
